header.header_title: A dignified farewell, an eternal memory.
header.header_description: Compassionate, dignified cremation services to honor the memory of your cherished pet with the respect they deserve.

services.services_description: We offer a range of specialized and respectful services to honor your pet's memory, ensuring dignity and the utmost respect at all times.
services.individual_cremation_description: Individual cremation allows you to keep your pet's ashes, delivered in a basic urn along with a certificate of authenticity, so you can preserve their memory in a special and unique way.
services.collective_cremation_description: Collective cremation is a more affordable option, ideal for those who want to give their pet a dignified end without receiving the ashes. It also helps avoid contamination and contributes to environmental well-being.
services.memorial_products_description: Exquisite urns, paw prints, and personalized keepsakes to honor and preserve your pet's memory in a unique way.
services.home_pickup_description: A respectful and compassionate transport service, ensuring the transfer of your pet from your home to our facilities with the utmost dignity.

process.title: The Process
process.description: Our process is designed to give your pet a farewell filled with love and respect.
process.initial_contact_description: Reach out to us by phone, email, or through our website. We're available 24/7 to assist you during this difficult time.
process.arrangements_description: Discuss your preferences, select the type of cremation service, and choose any memorial products you desire.
process.transportation_description: We'll arrange for the gentle transport of your pet from your home or veterinary clinic to our facility.
process.cremation_description: Your pet will be cremated with care and dignity according to your chosen service type.
process.return_ashes_description: Receive your pet's ashes in your selected urn, either by pickup at our facility or delivery to your home.
process.aftercare_support_description: We continue to provide resources and support to help you navigate your grief journey.

about.title: About us
about.paragraph1: We started this project in 2015 with the mission of meeting a need that many pet owners — including ourselves — had long been asking for: providing a dignified and respectful farewell for their beloved companions.
about.paragraph2: When choosing our cremation furnace, we prioritized two key aspects. First, ensuring it was specifically designed for pets, guaranteeing a gentle and appropriate process. Second, minimizing environmental impact, knowing cremation can be a potentially polluting activity. Thanks to the technology we use, our estimated emissions are below 1%.
about.paragraph3: Our greatest wish is to support you when the difficult time comes to say goodbye, offering empathy and respect throughout this final farewell.
